name: Brandon Cox
title: Full-Stack Developer
employment_title: Senior Web Developer at Deep Fried Advertising
bio: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with a strong foundation in frontend development. Over the past 8 years, including 4 years as a Senior Web Developer, I've contributed significantly to a variety of projects, leveraging my expertise in HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, React, and Next.js. I'm committed to continuously expanding my skill set. Through training and self-directed projects, I've added Node.js, Express, and Python to my toolkit, allowing me to tackle full-stack challenges with confidence.
